# Non-Inflation Gross Return

## Bootstraping

```{r, echo=FALSE}
port <- Sim_Port(sp$GrossReturn, 40, simfun = Spl_Boot)
```

### 40 years
```{r, echo=FALSE}
Sim_Plot(port, 40) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks=c(0,10000000,20000000,30000000),labels = c("$0", "$10,000,000", "$20,000,000", "$30,000,000"))
```

### 35 years
```{r, echo=FALSE}
Sim_Plot(port, 35) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks=c(0,5000000,10000000,15000000),labels = c("$0", "$5,000,000", "$10,000,000", "$15,000,000"))
```

### 30 years
```{r, echo=FALSE}
Sim_Plot(port, 30) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks=c(0,3000000,6000000,9000000),labels = c("$0", "$3,000,000", "$6,000,000", "$9,000,000"))
```

### 25 years
```{r, echo=FALSE}
Sim_Plot(port, 25) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks=c(0,1000000,2000000,3000000),labels = c("$0", "$1,000,000", "$2,000,000", "$3,000,000"))
```

### 20 years
```{r, echo=FALSE}
Sim_Plot(port, 20)  +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks=c(0,500000,1000000,1500000),labels = c("$0", "$500,000", "$1,000,000", "$1,5000,000"))
```
